entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E] With NET8 preview 1 SDK installed, component names display incorrectly when installing workload. #30395

Closed

  • Scoped Service in a Singleton is allowed when it shouldn't #30396
  • .Net 7 preview 7 is broken on linux arm64 via QEMU #27190
  • Cannot reference WindowsAppSdk and a WPF library in the same project: There was no runtime pack available for win10-arm #29913
  • Formatting with multi-line raw literals indents with `dotnet run` #28478

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30417
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #30416
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30414
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30413
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2107374 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Filter out default member attribute for types with indexer. Implement filtering out base type and interfaces. #30394
    Area-GenAPI
  • fix repo build on non-ubuntu linux #30379
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to 7.0.104 #30403
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix NRE in installer tests #30056
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable PRs for all release builds and remove some CI #30083
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update to the automated build pool variable #30370
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.3xx] fixed bug in `CreateTemporaryFolder` counter logic #30358
  • Update branding to 6.0.407 #30405
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.310 #30402
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.115 #30401
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 7.0.201 #30406
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.8.0 to 19.9.0 in /eng/dependabot #30355
    Area-Infrastructure, dependencies
  • Switch to OSX 12 for 7.0.1xx #30081
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: synthesize private fields for value types #30362
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30353
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
